text:
Hey y'all :wave:

In this product-led era, we're even more determined to understand how & why customers are engaging with our products. 

You'd agree that without product analytics this would be a fool's dream. 

This is why we put our minds together to write this in-depth guide to getting started on product analytics for those who are yet to start and for those who need brushing up! 

Here's what you can expect to learn…

:thinking_face: Why product analytics is an absolute must

:question: What questions you can easily answer with product analytics

:handshake: How different teams are utilizing product analytics

:chart_with_upwards_trend: How your product analytics stack should evolve over time

All this and more on this one-stop fundamentals guide on product analytics :arrow_down_small:

<https://iterative.ly/blog/product-analytics-the-fundamental-guide-for-2020/|https://iterative.ly/blog/product-analytics-the-fundamental-guide-for-2020/>

attachments.title: Product Analytics: The Fundamental Guide for 2020 | Iteratively
attachments.text: How to get started and evolve your analytics stack overtime. All this & more in this one-stop guide to product analytics.
attachments.fallback: Product Analytics: The Fundamental Guide for 2020 | Iteratively
